name: Von Dutch Striped Trucker Hat, Adjustable
description: Blue & White Striped, White Mesh Von Dutch Truckers Hat. Orangey-brown feathers, ruby & opal Swarovski Crystals, a crystal pendant, and dangling baubles make this hat perfect for a night out on the town or running around to your favorite thrift stores. This hat is adjustable and fits most head sizes.

name: Prized Fang - Flower, Feather, & Skull Hair Clip
description:
She had won the squabble and his fang in the process…she couldn't think of a better way to show off her loot. A sun-bleached tan flower, a velvety green leaf, and a few feathers. In the center of the flower, a bone white crackled skull with green swarovski crystal eyes guarding the prized fang.

This clip stands at 9" tall and will sit securely in your hair or dreads with a 2" french barrette on the back.

name: Dainty Wolf - Flower, Feather, & Skull Hair Clip
description:
Normally a lone wolf but feel like a night out? This accoutrement is sure to get you noticed. A short fuzzy green leaf, bloodwine feathers, and golden bean pods crown a small white skull and crystal pendant, set against a distressed earthy green flower.

9" at it's tallest, this floral adornment will stay secure in your hair or dreads with a 2" french barrette.

name: Black Sparrow - Flower, Feather, & Skull Hair Clip
description:
When not just any flower hair clip will do…this statement piece starts with a rustic green flower, topped with a plethora of feathers, leaves, & moss all surrounding a black skull with orange swarovski crystal eyes and a dangling sparrow.

10" tall with a 2" french barrette to hold it securely in your hair or dreads.

name: Ruby Stars Hand Dyed Tie Dye Silk Habotai Sarong, Scarf, Home Accent
description:
Ruby Stars
This 44"x44" Handmade Tie-Dye has variations of red, grey, white, & black. Lustrous and flowing, breathable an beautiful, this silk tye dye piece is easily cared for and great for everyday wear or as a home accent.

About Silk Habotai
It is traditionally woven in Japan and the word habotai translates as “soft as down”. Now it is mostly woven in China and referred to as “China Silk”. Silk habotai is a lightweight, breathable fabric with a soft & supple hand & a lustrous sheen. I use 100% Silk Habotai to create OOAK designs through different methods of tie-dying.

name: Solar Explosion Hand Dyed Tie Dye Silk Habotai Scarf, Dread Wrap, Table Runner
description:
Solar Explosion
This 8"x54" Handmade Tie-Dye has multiple shades and variations of orange with an off white accent. Lustrous and flowing, breathable an beautiful, this silk tye dye piece is easily cared for and great for everyday wear or as a home accent.

About Silk Habotai
It is traditionally woven in Japan and the word habotai translates as “soft as down”. Now it is mostly woven in China and referred to as “China Silk”. Silk habotai is a lightweight, breathable fabric with a soft & supple hand & a lustrous sheen. I use 100% Silk Habotai to create OOAK designs through different methods of tie-dying.

name: Pluto's Snakeskin Hand Dyed Tie Dye Silk Habotai Scarf, Dread Wrap, Table Runner
description:
Pluto's Snakeskin
This 10"x57" Handmade Tie-Dye has rustic but striking variations of orange, red, blue, teal, with pops of yellow against a light grey. Lustrous and flowing, breathable an beautiful, this silk tye dye piece is easily cared for and great for everyday wear or as a home accent.

About Silk Habotai

name: Sunset Over Jupiter Hand Dyed Tie-Dye Silk Habotai Scarf, Sarong, Table Runner, Dread Wrap
description:
Sunset Over Jupiter
This 14"x68" Handmade Tie-Dye has vibrant variations of reds, pinks, oranges with subtle tan, yellow and purple tones. Lustrous and flowing, breathable an beautiful, this silk tie dye piece is easily cared for and great for everyday wear or as a home accent.

About Silk Habotai
It is traditionally woven in Japan and the word habotai translates as “soft as down”. Now it is mostly woven in China and referred to as “China Silk”. Silk habotai is a lightweight, breathable fabric with a soft & supple hand & a lustrous sheen. I use 100% Silk Habotai to create OOAK designs through different methods of tie-dying.

name: Solar Flair Hand Dyed Tie Dye Silk Charmeuse Scarf, Sarong, Dread Wrap, Table Runner
description:
Solar Flare
This 13"x54" Handmade Tie-Dyed Silk Charmeuse has incredibly intense variations of oranges, red, and yellows. The "mercedes" of silks, it's much more tightly woven giving it a firm, soft, & supple hand and a luxuriously heavy drape. Dyes will show an intensity of color and richness on this fiber. Traditionally considered to be the best of the best. This piece has a hand rolled hem with 100% silk thread.

name: 20" SE Raggamuffin - 8pc Dread Adornment Set
description:
8 - 20" Single Ended Multicolor Blend. Don't want to dye your dreads but still want some fun color? The Raggamuffin Dread Adornment set is the answer! This long 8 piece multicolor blend will compliment any hair color. A tiny silver skull completes this Voodoo Dread set.

Perfect to add in to your dreads or undreaded hair for a pop of color and fun!

100% kanekalon. I blend and crochet these dreads so no two in the set will be exactly alike! These look, feel, & mature like real dreads and  can be added into existing dreads or non-dreaded hair. While these can be washed normally, please refrain from using residue forming products (i.e. conditioner, hairspray, etc) or applying heat directly to them. When installed in non-dread hair, Voodoo Dreads should be removed and reinstalled every 6-8 weeks.

Voodoo Dreads are lovingly made by Southern Dreadology based out of Tulsa, Ok. A premier dread services company, Southern Dreadology offers new dreads, maintenance, repair, human hair & synthetic dreads for permanent and temporary install. Please visit www.facebook.com/SouthernDreadology for more info and pictures!

name: 19" to 24" SE Dolucita - 35pc Dread Adornment Set
description:
35 - 19" to 24" Single Ended Auburn, Red, Purple, Blue, & Green blend. Inspired by the sun setting over neon-sign lined Bourbon St, this set is my personal favorite. 

13 dreads are a luscious auburn, red & purple blend. 14 transition from auburn/red/purple into purple/blue/green blend. 8 are a blend of all five colors. Varying in length and diameter, this set is incredibly soft and uber knotty. 

Perfect to add in to your dreads or undreaded for a pop of color and fun!

100% kanekalon. I blend and crochet these dreads so no two in the set will be exactly alike! These look, feel, & mature like real dreads and  can be added into existing dreads or non-dreaded hair. While these can be washed normally, please refrain from using residue forming products (i.e. conditioner, hairspray, etc) or applying heat directly to them. Please visit www.facebook.com/SouthernDreadology for more info and pictures!

description:

name: 14" SE Beach Bum - 10pc Dread Adornment Set
description:
